flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Even though its body is extremelynskinny, it is blindingly fastnwhen catching its prey.
It prefers hot and humidnenvironments. It is quick atncapturing prey with its vines.
A carnivorousnPOKéMON that trapsnand eats bugs.fIt uses its rootnfeet to soak upnneeded moisture.
A carnivorousnPOKéMON that trapsnand eats bugs.fIt uses its rootnfeet to soak upnneeded moisture.
Prefers hot andnhumid places.nIt ensnares tinyfinsects with itsnvines and devoursnthem.
Even though itsnbody is extremelynskinny, it isfblindingly fastnwhen catching itsnprey.
It plants its feetndeep undergroundnto replenish wa­fter. It can't es­ncape its enemynwhile it's rooted.
If it noticesnanything thatnmoves, itfimmediately flingsnits vine at thenobject.
BELLSPROUT’s thin and flexible bodynlets it bend and sway to avoid anynattack, however strong it may be.fFrom its mouth, this POKéMON spits ancorrosive fluid that melts even iron.
BELLSPROUT’s thin and flexible bodynlets it bend and sway to avoid anynattack, however strong it may be.fFrom its mouth, this POKéMON spits ancorrosive fluid that melts even iron.
A BELLSPROUT’s thin and flexible body letsnit bend and sway to avoid any attack,nhowever strong it may be. From its mouth,nit leaks a fluid that melts even iron.
Its bud looks like a human face. Becausenof the bud, it is rumored to be a type ofnlegendary mandrake plant.
A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eatsnbugs. It appears to use its root feet tonreplenish moisture.
It prefers hot and humidnenvironments. It is quick atncapturing prey with its vines.
It prefers hot and humidnenvironments. It is quick atncapturing prey with its vines.
It plants its feet deep undergroundnto replenish water. It can’t escapenits enemy while it’s rooted.
Il préfère les climats chauds etnhumides. Ses lianes peuventncapturer une proie en un clin d’œil.
It prefers hot and humidnenvironments. It is quick atncapturing prey with its vines.
Il préfère les climats chauds etnhumides. Ses lianes peuventncapturer une proie en un clin d’œil.
It prefers hot and humidnenvironments. It is quick atncapturing prey with its vines.
It prefers hot and humidnenvironments. It is quick atncapturing prey with its vines.
It prefers hot and humidnenvironments. It is quick atncapturing prey with its vines.
ひょろっとした　からだつき　だがnえものを　とらえるときの　うごきはnめにも　とまらないほど　すばやい。
홀쭉한 체격이지만n먹이를 잡을 때의 움직임은n눈에 보이지 않을 정도로 빠르다.
Même si son corps est très frêle, ce Pokémon estnextrêmement rapide quand il attaque ses adversaires.
Obwohl sein Körper sehr schmal ist,nschnappt es blitzschnell nach Beute.
Aunque su cuerpo es extremadamente delgado, esnmuy rápido a la hora de capturar sus presas.
Sebbene abbia un corpo magrissimo, sa esserenmolto rapido quando si scaglia sulla preda.
Even though its body is extremely skinny, it isnblindingly fast when catching its prey.
ひょろっとした　体つきだがn獲物を　捕らえるときの　動きはn目にも　とまらないほど　素早い。
ひとの　かおのような　ツボミからnでんせつの　マンドラゴラの　いっしゅnではないかと　ささやかれている。
사람 얼굴 같은 봉오리 때문에n전설의 꽃 만드라고라의 일종이n아닐까 하는 소문이 돌고 있다.
Son bourgeon ressemble à un visage humain.nSelon la légende, Chétiflor serait un type denmandragore légendaire.
Seine Knospe ähnelt einem Menschengesicht.nMan sagt, dass es mit der legendären Mandragoranverwandt ist.
Tiene cara de persona. Por el aspecto que tiene se hancomentado que podría ser algún tipo de mandrágoranlegendaria.
Il bocciolo somigliante a un volto umano fa ritenerenche si tratti di un leggendario esemplare dinmandragola.
Its bud looks like a human face. Because of thenbud, it is rumored to be a type of legendarynmandrake plant.
人の　顔のような　つぼみからn伝説の　マンドラゴラのn一種ではないかと　ささやかれている。
ほそく　しなやかな　からだは　どんな　つよいnこうげきでも　しなって　よける　ことが　できる。nくちから　てつも　とかしてしまう　えきを　だす。
가늘고 유연한 몸은 아무리 강한n공격이라도 휘어져 피할 수 있다.n입에서 철도 녹일 수 있는 액체가 나온다.

Le corps long et flexible de Chétiflor lui permet de se tordrenet d’osciller pour éviter tout type d’attaque, même les plusnpuissantes. Ce Pokémon crache un fluide corrosif qui peutnmême dissoudre le fer.

Knofensas schlanker und elastischer Körper ermöglicht es ihm,njedem Angriff auszuweichen, so heftig dieser auch sein mag.nDieses Pokémon spuckt eine ätzende Flüssigkeit aus,ndie sogar Eisen zersetzen kann.

Bellsprout tiene un cuerpo delgado y flexible que le permiteninclinarse y balancearse para esquivar los ataques. EstenPokémon escupe por la boca un fluido corrosivo capaz denhacer que se derrita hasta el hierro.
Il corpo esile e flessibile di Bellsprout gli consentendi piegarsi e oscillare per evitare ogni attacco, anchenviolento. Dalla bocca sputa un fluido corrosivo in gradondi sciogliere anche il ferro.
Bellsprout’s thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway tonavoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth,nthis Pokémon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.
細く　しなやかな　体は　どんな　強いn攻撃でも　しなって　避ける　ことが　できる。n口から　鉄も　溶かしてしまう　液を　出す。
ほそく　しなやかな　からだは　どんな　つよいnこうげきでも　しなって　よける　ことが　できる。nくちから　てつも　とかしてしまう　えきを　だす。
가늘고 유연한 몸은 아무리 강한n공격이라도 휘어져 피할 수 있다.n입에서 철도 녹일 수 있는 액체를 뿜는다.

Le corps long et flexible de Chétiflor lui permet de se tordrenet d’osciller pour éviter tout type d’attaque, même les plusnpuissantes. Ce Pokémon crache un fluide corrosif qui peutnmême dissoudre le fer.

Knofensas schlanker und elastischer Körper ermöglichtnes ihm, jeglichem Angriff auszuweichen, so heftig diesernauch sein mag. Dieses Pokémon spuckt eine ätzendenFlüssigkeit aus, die sogar Eisen zersetzen kann.

Bellsprout tiene un cuerpo delgado y flexible que le permiteninclinarse y balancearse para esquivar los ataques. EstenPokémon escupe por la boca un fluido corrosivo capaz denhacer que se derrita hasta el hierro.
Il corpo esile e flessibile di Bellsprout gli consentendi piegarsi e oscillare per evitare ogni attacco, anchenviolento. Dalla bocca sputa un fluido corrosivo in gradondi sciogliere anche il ferro.
Bellsprout’s thin and flexible body lets it bend and swaynto avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth,nthis Pokémon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.
細く　しなやかな　体は　どんな　強いn攻撃でも　しなって　避ける　ことが　できる。n口から　鉄も　溶かしてしまう　液を　出す。
おんどが　たかく　しつどの　あるnところを　このむ。ツルを　つかってnちいさなムシを　とらえて　たべる。
온도가 높고 습기가 있는n장소를 좋아한다. 덩굴을 사용해n작은 벌레를 잡아먹는다.
喜歡高溫多濕的環境。n會利用藤蔓捕捉小蟲n當成自己的食物。
Il préfère les endroits chauds et humides.nIl capture les Pokémon Insecte avec ses lianesnpour les dévorer.
Knofensa bevorzugt einen warmen und feuchtennLebensraum. Es ernährt sich von kleinen Käfer-nPokémon, die es mit seinen Ranken fängt.
Prefiere lugares cálidos y húmedos. Atrapanpequeños Pokémon insectos con sus lianas parandevorarlos.
Ama i luoghi caldi e umidi. Cattura minuscolinPokémon di tipo Coleottero con i suoi viticcine poi li divora.
Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnaresntiny bugs with its vines and devours them.
温度が　高く　湿度の　あるnところを　好む。ツルを　使ってn小さなムシを　捕らえて　食べる。
喜欢温度高，有一定n湿度的地方。它会用n身上的藤蔓抓小虫来吃。
